snippet: Can you calculate the odds that the first three voters in a given district will have an incorrect name or address, if given the total number of voters there and the number of them that a group alleges are registered at false addresses or under false...
abstract: Can you calculate the odds that the first three voters in a given district will have an incorrect name or address, if given the total number of voters there and the number of them that a group alleges are registered at false addresses or under false names?
